title: Jouzu na Otoko no Otoshikata
sinopse:
1. Kosamefuru Hodoukyou (The place where it rained on the footbridge)
2. Kosamefuru Hodoukyou: Side B
3. Cool ja Irarenai (I don't need to be cool)
4. Break Through
5. Requiem Thanam (Eternal Repose)
6. Koi no Ki-se-ki (Love's Won-der)
7. Shikenkan Koibito Ikuseihou (Test tube lover's growth method)
8. After 5 wa AM 4:00 (After 5 is 4 am)
